org.raspberrypi.cecil.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raspberrypi.cecil.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerInterface

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerInterface
    Controller class for interfacing between the model and view. This class creates an instance of the view (Frame) and model (Cecil) classes. This class contains the main method. MIT Open Source License
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Cathy Jin (cj8g10), Shreeprabha Aggarwal (sa10g10) Southampton University, United Kingdom
